content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great place to live. Let's discuss the price. How much were you thinking of paying?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for a cheap place to stay. So, I was thinking of 300 Euro per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my asking price. The location and amenities of this apartment are excellent, and I'm looking for a fair market price. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. The apartment is indeed in a great location and well-equipped. However, I am a student and I have to consider my budget. So, I am willing to pay 350 Euro per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 350 Euro per month is still below my expectations. I'm looking to rent this apartment for at least 400 Euro per month. It's a brand-new apartment with all the modern conveniences in the heart of the city. Would you be willing to meet me at 400 Euro?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your explanation. However, 400 Euro is quite expensive for me as a student. I am willing to pay 375 Euro per month, which is the highest I can afford.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 375 Euro is still not enough for this apartment. The demand for such apartments in the city center is high, and I can easily find a tenant who is willing to pay the market price. How about we meet in the middle at 387.5 Euro? This is a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my financial situation. I agree to your offer. I will pay 387.5 Euro per month to rent the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 387.5 Euro! We have a deal. Please let me know when you would like to sign the lease and move in.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I plan to sign the lease in two weeks and move in on the first day of the following month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's great to hear, Maryam. I'll prepare all the necessary documents for the lease signing. If you have any questions or need assistance with anything regarding the move, please let me know. Welcome to Magdeburg!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your help and cooperation. I am looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: You're welcome, Maryam. I'm glad we could work out a deal that suits both of us. Enjoy your stay in Magdeburg! If you have any further questions or need assistance with anything, feel free to contact me. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
